name: Pocket Farmery: Idle Pop Farm
description:
Welcome to the country side where you start your own farm. Harvest your crops and animal, eventually finding and raising the magical plants and animals that no other farms have. Build up support building to help your harvest grows and get income even when you are offline.Get help from experienced (and strange) farmers to help you develop your farm to its fullest extent.
Features:
Innovative pop match 3 system to replace the mindless tapping mechanics of most idle games.
Get help from 20 experienced farmers.
Collect over 50 types of animals, plants and buildings and upgrade them to unlock the full potential.
Generous daily gifts.
Random missions with many rewards.
Helpful little fingers to keep your real fingers relaxed.
Earn income even when you are away.
Many strategies all lead to success.
Hidden secrets waiting to be discovered.
